title: God page

properties.name: description
properties.value: God pages (also known as torn pages) are possible rewards from all tiers of Treasure Trails except beginner clues. Each god page is coloured to represent their respective god: Armadyl is silver, Bandos is brown, Guthix is green, Saradomin is blue, Zamorak is red, and Zaros is purple. Four god pages, numbered 1 through 4, must be put in their respective damaged book to complete the god book, however all four are not required at the same time to add pages to the book.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:God pages

God pages (also known as torn pages) are possible rewards from all tiers of Treasure Trails except beginner clues. Each god page is coloured to represent their respective god: Armadyl is silver, Bandos is brown, Guthix is green, Saradomin is blue, Zamorak is red, and Zaros is purple. Four god pages, numbered 1 through 4, must be put in their respective damaged book to complete the god book, however all four are not required at the same time to add pages to the book.

Contents

  • 1 Book of darkness
  • 2 Book of law
  • 3 Book of war
  • 4 Holy book
  • 5 Book of balance
  • 6 Unholy book
  • 7 Changes

Book of darkness[edit | edit source]

The following pages are adding to the ancient damaged book to make the book of darkness:

Item GE Price
Ancient page 1 25,030
Ancient page 2 28,423
Ancient page 3 24,464
Ancient page 4 29,149
Total 107,066
Compare
Book of darkness page set 144,687
Difference 37,621
